title: Facebook's cryptocurrency Libra risks falling apart before it has even started
text:
At the start of this summer, Facebook invited me to the old San Francisco Mint, a building that symbolised the original California Gold Rush, for an early look at the company’s plans to enter finance.

It had been rumoured for months that the social network was planning to release its own cryptocurrency, digital-only money designed to pounds and dollars as a means of exchange. But the plan that Facebook’s crypto chief David Marcus laid out was not what many people had been expecting.
